actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to waive the applicability of sections 2382 and 7300 of title 10, United States Code, to contracts for the construction or manufacture of naval vessels or military aircraft with respect to which final payment is made before October 1, 1981.

summary.text: Waives profit limitations on contracts for the construction or manufacture of all or parts of aircraft and naval vessels upon which final payment is made before October, 1981.

titles.title: A bill to waive the applicability of sections 2382 and 7300 of title 10, United States Code, to contracts for the construction or manufacture of naval vessels or military aircraft with respect to which final payment is made before October 1, 1981.
